kunkun.name: IP Info
kunkun.shortDescription: Show your current IP Info and Search for IP Address
kunkun.longDescription: Will display you IP Address and more information about this IP address, including Geo Location, ASN, ISP. You can also search for a specific IP.

templateUiCmds.name: IP Info
templateUiCmds.description: Display your current IP addres and detailed information. Search for other IP address.
